articles.title: Trump administration's universal flu vaccine project puzzles scientists - NPR
articles.description: The Trump administration has launched a $500 million project to develop a universal flu vaccine that won't need yearly updates. But vaccine experts are mystified by its focus on a dated technology.
articles.content:
Vaccine experts are perplexed by a project the Trump administration has launched to develop a universal flu vaccine, which has long been a goal, though an elusive one, in medical research. 
Dubbed G… [+4614 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.title: Google announces Material 3 Expressive, a colorful evolution of Android design - Ars Technica
articles.description: Google’s take on Android is getting brighter and bolder later this year.
